Hi.

With a basic DecideRule sequence it seems to me as redirects are always fetched (including transitions and embeds from the resulting page) 
no matter the resulting page (the one that the redirect goes to) are inside or outside of the ordinary scope.

Are there any way of defining a filter that only follows redirects if the resulting page is also inside scope ??

My DecideRule Sequence is:
RejectDecideRule
OnDomainDecideRule
TooManyHopsDecideRule
PathologicalPathDecideRule
TransclusionDecideRule
TooManyPathSegmentsDecideRulePrerequisiteAcceptDecideRule

URLs that I do not want all have this Hoppath: RLRXE

I want the scoping and thus fetching to stop with the L - the second redirect goes out of my scope.

best
